snippet.title: 'Escape From Monkey Island' Trailer
snippet.description:
Here is an early trailer for the 4th game in the Monkey Island series - 'Escape From Monkey Island'. It's basically just the intro of the game but with a little bit of other footage from the game. This video is available from:

http://www.milegend.com

and the direct link is:

http://www.milegend.com/downloads/movies/Monkey_high.mov
